        Improve this doc

        fa-scroll-view

        This directive allows you to specify a famo.us Scrollview that will lay out a collection of renderables sequentially in the specified direction and will allow you to scroll through them with mousewheel or touch events.

        Usage

        <fa-scroll-view>
  <fa-view>
    <!-- content -->
  </fa-view>
</fa-scroll-view>

        +
